attributes.action: Remove Pakistan from Travel Red List like EU countries removed a month ago.
attributes.additional_details: Remove Pakistan from the red list. There is only Delta variant in Pakistan and EU countries already removed Pakistan from their Red list and from the list of variant of concerned. Thousands of people are still stuck in Pakistan! Families are struggling financially and don’t have enough to pay for the quarantine. No direct flights are being run! Help us come home, at least those british citizens who are fully vaccinated and can do home quarantine in the UK.
attributes.background: To reconsider Pakistan for either Amber or Amber plus status and adapt UAE style 4 hour pre-departure PCR testing at Pakistan Airports to fully vaccinated people and remove the ban of hotel quarantine! Help people come back to their homes and quarantine at home and be with their families in Pakistan

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
